text: Standby Power (battery condition, backup time, where applicable)
Function Simulator Test (confirm reference heat test, heat, alarm levels)
Talker Radio Confirmation (radio message, talker repeat protocols)
AC Power and Components (phases consistent and equal under load)
Transducers (clean, tight, detection starts when transducer is activated)
Bearing Scanner (clean, tight, mirror, alignment, mounting, lens, filters, shields, heater, target if applicable)
Hot Wheel Scanner (clean, tight, mirror, alignment, mounting, lens, filters, shields, heater, target if applicable)
Scanner Interference (spikes, rail clips, etc. clear of scanners, deflection plates tight & not touching scanner)
DED Condition (panels intact, securely fastened on the ties, returns to a positive upright position when pushed on both sides)
DED Alarm Detection Test (test during function simulation)
External Condition of Housing (foundations, door, locks, free of debris)
Internal Condition of Housing (clean, sealed, ventilation, moisture, no evidence of infestation)
Track Conditions (gauge, plates, drainage, rail pumping)
Junction Boxes (condition, no sign of infestation, no frost heave, no moisture, no contamination)
Timetable, Logbook, Maintenance Manuals (all applicable information available, complete, correct)
Record of Tests (monthly, 3-month, 6-month, annual, 4-year, 10-year operational tests complete) as per Sound Engineering Practices (ex: manufacturers manual, AREMA, railway standards or practices)
Evidence of Trespassing (cut fence, worn footpath, witnessed event)
Persons performing duties did not appear familiar with equipment/components within their responsibility.
Persons performing duties did not appear familiar with the railways inspection and testing requirements, and other procedures.
Persons performing duties did not appear to have an understanding of safety requirements during testing, and/or how to protect safe railway operations during the undertaking of their duties.

Persons performing duties were not able to correctly answer all questions and perform all tasks requested by the RSI at the time of inspection, and/or did not appear confident and knowledgeable when implementing them.
Software and Calibration
Design Plan Conditions (complete, accurate, legible, up to date)
Location Conditions (equipment, lightning protection)
Wiring Identification and Terminations
Wire and Cable Defects
Track Circuit (where applicable)
Circuit Grounds (no leakage to ground, perform test while system is active and at rest)
Battery Isolation Condition (no voltage potential between power supplies)
Insulation of Scanners
Miscellaneous Issues
